CAREER SUMMARY
Borealis AG, Consumer Products (Turkey, Greece & FSU Countries)
2023 –
Sales Manager
● Manage sales forecasting and planning.
● Deal with customer plans and action tracking.
● Customer acquisition; managing customer relationships, leading customer negotiations, sales execution.
● Manage stakeholder relations along the value chain.
● Manage of price and commercial conditions.
● Develop a clear strategy and targets (volume, price, profit, segments) for the overall sales responsibility in line with respective strategy; customise sales strategies and targets for assigned customer.
● Provide accurate input for forecasting and operational planning to satisfy customer requirements and optimize the PO
business.
● Effectively use defined sales tools to articulate, communicate and deliver upon defined sales strategies
● Plan and conduct negotiations, based on a sound understanding of relevant factors in customers’ decision making, PO
value propositions and market dynamics.
● Acquire and develop new customers in priority segments.
● Sell products and services based on defined value propositions and customer interaction models, driving volume growth
at optimized margins.
● Proactively address structurally unprofitable business; continuously optimize customer profitability by active price
management, using available tools.
● Foster open, timely communication and cooperation between customer team members, ensuring a high level of
performance and team unity.
● Develop and sustain customer relations at all relevant levels to improve the PO commercial position, identify customer
requirements and deliver on commercial plans and targets.
● Manage after-sales activities and follow up with customers on Borealis performance, develop mitigation actions;
provide feedback in line with the strategy.
Celanese Sales Germany Gmbh, Emerging Region (TR, ZA, IL, UAE...)
2014 – 2023
Account Development Manager
● Launched new Celanese office in Turkey and enabled distributors and Celanese to have quick access to customers by
providing significant support and assistance.
● Improved Celanese's revenue from €2,0Mn to €8,5Mn within four years by excellently managing new and existing
accounts in designated sales zone.
● Increased number of active invoiced customers from 33 to 90 on annual basis to Identify key target clients, as well as
potential customers for business growth and development.
● Maximised project pipeline's growth to 32% with closed win ratio by recognising new growth opportunities across wide
range of business sectors.
● Executed exceptional services for business start-ups by identifying commercial buildings in Istanbul, organising
purchases for workforces, and settling lease agreements with office's landlord.
Summary
Goal-oriented and accomplished professional with extensive experience in executing strategic ideas/plans for account management. Proven success in developing robust relationships with potential clients and establishing productive environment of continuous growth. Well-versed in identifying new opportunities and raising business profits/ revenues. Solid history of collaborating with sales partners/planners, evaluating customer demands, and fulfilling requirements with appropriate solutions. High-performing individual; expert in analysing market trends and improving account figures. Adept at employing innovative tools/techniques to enhance diversity of spend. High-performing individual; thrive in fast-paced and challenging environments.
